TextView.android:text: Here's a glimpse of how TICKER works:

1. Enter your time table just once with all the subjects and lectures scheduled for the entire Semester.
 2. You can modify the time table anytime according to your needs
 3. The minimum attendance is set to 75% which can be updated any time.
 4. If any of the subject tab is red, it indicates that your attendance is below the minimum required bar.
 5. A notification at 21:00 would pop up each day demanding that day's number of lectures attended and skipped. You can either accept it or decline it if it was a holiday.
 6. At any point of time you can edit the total number of lectures that took place and the number of lectures you attended out of them.
 7. All the data can be reset and you can start afresh.
